title: First Strike for PBE Only
body: I don't know completely about this topic. Is the First Strike border only for people on PBE or will we get it on the live servers. As of now we don't and today was the day that it was supposed to come out. My main question is should they only be aloud only for those on PBE or should they be on the live servers?

replies.body:
Hey Minerx130,

First Strike borders will be available on live for players who purchase the PROJECT: skins during the first week at full price. Gifted PROJECT: skins will also receive the border.
Do the loading banners work only when using that skin or can you play someone like shaco with the loading banner
Can we have a specific time?? i cant wait much longer..
I would like to know that but i can wait 1 hour
dang i think we need to wait then
They should be released in about an hour and first strike will last for 1 week on live servers so buy them while you can
Thanks for the information somebody told me they where not going to come out on live.
